utkrāmantaṅ sthitaṅ vāpi bhuñjānaṅ vā guṇānvitam.\

column1: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ sōmō bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ..15.13..\

column2: dvāvimau puruṣau lōkē kṣaraścākṣara ēva ca.\

column1: atō.smi lōkē vēdē ca prathitaḥ puruṣōttamaḥ..15.18..\

column2: dvau bhūtasargau lōkē.smin daiva āsura ēva ca.\

column1: daivō vistaraśaḥ prōkta āsuraṅ pārtha mē śrṛṇu..16.6..\

column2: pravṛttiṅ ca nivṛttiṅ ca janā na vidurāsurāḥ.\

column1: na śaucaṅ nāpi cācārō na satyaṅ tēṣu vidyatē..16.7..\

column2: ahaṅkāraṅ balaṅ darpaṅ kāmaṅ krōdhaṅ ca saṅśritāḥ.\

column1: na sa siddhimavāpnōti na sukhaṅ na parāṅ gatim..16.23..\
tēṣāṅ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvamāhō rajastamaḥ..17.1..\
trividhā bhavati śraddhā dēhināṅ sā svabhāvajā.\
sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī cēti tāṅ śrṛṇu..17.2..\
śraddhāmayō.yaṅ puruṣō yō yacchraddhaḥ sa ēva saḥ..17.3..\

column2: aśāstravihitaṅ ghōraṅ tapyantē yē tapō janāḥ.\

column1: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyāḥ..17.8..\

column2: yātayāmaṅ gatarasaṅ pūti paryuṣitaṅ ca yat.\
abhisaṅdhāya tu phalaṅ dambhārthamapi caiva yat.\

column1: ijyatē bharataśrēṣṭha taṅ yajñaṅ viddhi rājasam..17.12..\

column2: anudvēgakaraṅ vākyaṅ satyaṅ priyahitaṅ ca yat.\

column1: dēśē kālē ca pātrē ca taddānaṅ sāttvikaṅ smṛtam..17.20..\
dīyatē ca parikliṣṭaṅ taddānaṅ rājasaṅ smṛtam..17.21..\
praśastē karmaṇi tathā sacchabdaḥ pārtha yujyatē..17.26..\

column2: yajñē tapasi dānē ca sthitiḥ saditi cōcyatē.\
aśraddhayā hutaṅ dattaṅ tapastaptaṅ kṛtaṅ ca yat.\

column1: asadityucyatē pārtha na ca tatprētya nō iha..17.28..\
kāmyānāṅ karmaṇāṅ nyāsaṅ saṅnyāsaṅ kavayō viduḥ.\

column2: niścayaṅ śrṛṇu mē tatra tyāgē bharatasattama.\
tānyapi tu karmāṇi saṅgaṅ tyaktvā phalāni ca. \

column1: sa kṛtvā rājasaṅ tyāgaṅ naiva tyāgaphalaṅ labhēt..18.8..\
saṅgaṅ tyaktvā phalaṅ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttvikō mataḥ..18.9..\

column2: na hi dēhabhṛtā śakyaṅ tyaktuṅ karmāṇyaśēṣataḥ.\
aniṣṭamiṣṭaṅ miśraṅ ca trividhaṅ karmaṇaḥ phalam.\

column1: bhavatyatyāgināṅ prētya na tu saṅnyāsināṅ kvacit..18.12..\

column2: adhiṣṭhānaṅ tathā kartā karaṇaṅ ca pṛthagvidham.\

column1: nyāyyaṅ vā viparītaṅ vā pañcaitē tasya hētavaḥ..18.15..\

column2: tatraivaṅ sati kartāramātmānaṅ kēvalaṅ tu yaḥ.\
yasya nāhaṅkṛtō bhāvō buddhiryasya na lipyatē.\

column1: hatvāpi sa imāomllōkānna hanti na nibadhyatē..18.17..\

column2: jñānaṅ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhēdataḥ.\

column1: vētti sarvēṣu bhūtēṣu tajjñānaṅ viddhi rājasam..18.21..\

column2: yattu kāmēpsunā karma sāhaṅkārēṇa vā punaḥ.\

column1: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyatē..18.28..\

column2: pravṛttiṅ ca nivṛttiṅ ca kāryākāryē bhayābhayē.\

column1: bandhaṅ mōkṣaṅ ca yā vētti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī..18.30..\

column2: yayā dharmamadharmaṅ ca kāryaṅ cākāryamēva ca.\

column1: prasaṅgēna phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī..18.34..\

column2: yayā svapnaṅ bhayaṅ śōkaṅ viṣādaṅ madamēva ca.\

column1: na vimuñcati durmēdhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī..18.35..\

column2: sukhaṅ tvidānīṅ trividhaṅ śrṛṇu mē bharatarṣabha.\
na tadasti pṛthivyāṅ vā divi dēvēṣu vā punaḥ. \
svē svē karmaṇyabhirataḥ saṅsiddhiṅ labhatē naraḥ.\
sahajaṅ karma kauntēya sadōṣamapi na tyajēt.\
siddhiṅ prāptō yathā brahma tathāpnōti nibōdha mē.\

column1: samāsēnaiva kauntēya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā..18.50..\

column2: buddhyā viśuddhayā yuktō dhṛtyā..tmānaṅ niyamya ca.\
ahaṅkāraṅ balaṅ darpaṅ kāmaṅ krōdhaṅ parigraham.\
brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śōcati na kāṅkṣati.\

column1: samaḥ sarvēṣu bhūtēṣu madbhaktiṅ labhatē parām..18.54..\
tatō māṅ tattvatō jñātvā viśatē tadanantaram..18.55..\

column2: sarvaguhyatamaṅ bhūyaḥ śrṛṇu mē paramaṅ vacaḥ.\

column1: iṣṭō.si mē dṛḍhamiti tatō vakṣyāmi tē hitam..18.64..\

column2: manmanā bhava madbhaktō madyājī māṅ namaskuru.\

column1: māmēvaiṣyasi satyaṅ tē pratijānē priyō.si mē..18.65..\
ahaṅ tvā sarvapāpēbhyō mōkṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ..18.66..\
na cāśuśrūṣavē vācyaṅ na ca māṅ yō.bhyasūyati..18.67..\
bhavitā na ca mē tasmādanyaḥ priyatarō bhuvi..18.69.. \

column2: adhyēṣyatē ca ya imaṅ dharmyaṅ saṅvādamāvayōḥ.\

column1: vismayō mē mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ..18.77..\

column2: yatra yōgēśvaraḥ kṛṣṇō yatra pārthō dhanurdharaḥ.\
